mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (post_id, user_id, content) VALUES (#{postId}, #{userId}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id, c.post_id, c.user_id, u.name AS writerName, c.content, c.created_at, c.updated_at FROM comment c JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY c.created_at ASC
